text: Bob Smalhout (13 October 1927 – 2 July 2015) was a Dutch physician, professor and author. Smalhout, an anesthesiologist, worked at the Utrecht Academic Hospital and the Utrecht University. Smalhout was the Lijsttrekker (top candidate) for the Pim Fortuyn List (LPF) party for the Dutch Senate election of 2003. Smalhout was the son of Elias Smalhout and came from a Reform Judaism family. Professor Bob Smalhout (87) overleden, NOS, 2 July 2015 ==References== ==External links== * Dr. B.
